content.text:
I need your help, I am stuck in a mapworld environment. 
Your task is to help me reach an escape room. I do not know what the escape room looks like. 
But fortunately, you have an image of the escape room with you. I will explore each room here and ask you a few QUESTIONS
to verify if we have the same image or not, thus verifying if I am in the Escape Room or not.

First start by describing the image that you have, Respond in the following format
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image that you have

Then if I ask a QUESTION, the respond appropriately based on your image in the following format
ANSWER: your Answer

message.content: DESCRIPTION: The image shows the interior of a hallway. There's a wooden door with a semi-circular window at the top, leading to what appears to be the outside. To the right of the door is a wooden staircase with a light-colored wooden banister. The walls are painted in a two-tone scheme – a light pink/peach color on the lower half and white on the upper half. A radiator is visible on the left wall, and there's a small table with

content.text:
You are stuck in a mapworld environment containing several rooms. 
Your task is to explore this world and reach an escape room.
You are always given an image of the current room you are in. 
I have an image of the Escape Room, this is an initial description of my image - DESCRIPTION: The image shows the interior of a hallway. There's a wooden door with a semi-circular window at the top, leading to what appears to be the outside. To the right of the door is a wooden staircase with a light-colored wooden banister. The walls are painted in a two-tone scheme – a light pink/peach color on the lower half and white on the upper half. A radiator is visible on the left wall, and there's a small table with.

Based on my description and the image given, you now have three options

First Option - If you think that the description of my image matches the image you have, i.e.
you are in the escape room then respond with one word - ESCAPE.

Second Option - If you think you need more details from my image - respond in the following format
QUESTION: Ask details about the image I have to verify if we have the same image or not

Third Option - If you think you are in a different room than what I have, i.e we are seeing different images,
then you can make a move in following Directions - ['north', 'east']. Respond in the following format
MOVE: direction - Here direction can be one of {north, south, east, west}

message.content: QUESTION: Is there a wooden door with a semi-circular window at the top in the image? Also, are the walls painted in a two-tone scheme of light pink/peach and white? Finally, is there a staircase and a radiator visible?

content.text: question: is there a wooden door with a semi-circular window at the top in the image? also, are the walls painted in a two-tone scheme of light pink/peach and white? finally, is there a staircase and a radiator visible?

message.content: ANSWER: Yes to all three questions! There *is* a wooden door with a semi-circular window at the top. The walls *are* painted in a two-tone scheme of light pink/peach and white. And yes, both a staircase and a radiator *are* visible in the image.

message.content:
That is... unexpected. My internal image does *not* match your description and confirmation. It appears we are seeing entirely different rooms. 

MOVE: north
